name: Baldi Kills Fake Principal (Baldi Fan-Game)
description:
Info

This is a game I made in GameMaker because I was bored, nothing else.

Story

WOAH!!! Baldi had to take a fat dump in the toilet, then he got a call from the FAKE PRINCIPAL!!! :scream: AND HE GOT TELEPORTED!!! Now he has to fight the FAKE PRINCIPAL while throwing his sons at him to kill the FAKE PRINIPAL or something idk.

WARNING.

This game does contain the cuss words, so if you are sensitive to that DON'T PLAY!! and no, no clean version will ever be released. ENJOUUU
